page.title: 05VAUXHALL TRANSPORT
page.content: The{Millbrook test track}(Proving Ground) is used for testing Vauxhall vehicles, although other companies do utilize the facilities.One of the tracks is designed so that you can drive around with no hands on the steering wheel, this tests the general steering and performance of all the vehicles.At the test track they use computerized dummies to see how safe vehicles are in crashes.They have a lot of different methods for testing vehicles like driving up and down steep ramps , over rugged surfaces, through water and at high speeds and many others.They have special machines that simulate side on,head on and rear on crashes.The dummies are used in crashes and pedestrian safety.
